title: `riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf` link failed in a784a80228c9eac3aa0fd86fc90887d5fa20c82e
body:
```
rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.36.0-nightly (3f5152e20 2019-05-08)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 3f5152e200c0c02dfe0f79367948c98053d35855
commit-date: 2019-05-08
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.36.0-nightly
LLVM version: 8.0
```
compile success.
```
rustc 1.36.0-nightly (a784a8022 2019-05-09)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: a784a80228c9eac3aa0fd86fc90887d5fa20c82e
commit-date: 2019-05-09
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.36.0-nightly
LLVM version: 8.0
```
compile failed with error information:
```
cargo build --target riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf
    Updating git repository `https://github.com/sequencer/opensbi-rust`
   Compiling opensbi-rust v0.1.0 (https://github.com/sequencer/opensbi-rust#020e622b)
   Compiling myrcore v0.1.0 ($HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore)
error: linking with `rust-lld` failed: exit code: 1
  |
  = note: "rust-lld" "-flavor" "gnu" "-L" "$HOME/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/lib" "$HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/debug/deps/myrcore-42c1b6bebf8ad73e.2x64f5ttjthe9vmc.rcgu.o" "$HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/debug/deps/myrcore-42c1b6bebf8ad73e.49qor0vhuhmdtfqn.rcgu.o" "$HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/debug/deps/myrcore-42c1b6bebf8ad73e.4e6pdv4f5cmtk3zl.rcgu.o" "$HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/debug/deps/myrcore-42c1b6bebf8ad73e.5fdq6x7klg4xdykf.rcgu.o" "$HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/debug/deps/myrcore-42c1b6bebf8ad73e.t7ycxkm7thl15vk.rcgu.o" "-o" "$HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/debug/deps/myrcore-42c1b6bebf8ad73e" "--gc-sections" "-L" "$HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/debug/deps" "-L" "$HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/debug/deps" "-L" "$HOME/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/lib" "-Bstatic" "$HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/debug/deps/libopensbi_rust-34f61779679c24e1.rlib" "$HOME/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/lib/librustc_std_workspace_core-330c94737850f50a.rlib" "$HOME/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/lib/libcore-2e0fb004fad6ca66.rlib" "$HOME/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/lib/libcompiler_builtins-afe13c5355265d4c.rlib" "-Bdynamic"
  = note: rust-lld: error: $HOME/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/lib/libcompiler_builtins-afe13c5355265d4c.rlib(clzsi2.o) is incompatible with $HOME/$PROJECTS/myrcore/target/riscv64gc-unknown-none-elf/debug/deps/myrcore-42c1b6bebf8ad73e.2x64f5ttjthe9vmc.rcgu.o
```
